title: Iteration of Newton's Method
text: Recall that the iterative method is given by $$x_n+1=x_n-\operatorname{cf}\left(x_n\right)$$.
speech: Recall that the iterative method is given by  x sub n plus 1, is equal to x sub n minus, cf of, parentheses x sub n  .
pacedSpeech: Recall that the iterative method is given by   x sub n plus 1, is equal to x sub n minus, cf of,  x sub n
